channel.title: Goals
channel.description:
i had this awesome idea to make a thread that was about peoples goals in life because i was thinking about what i wanted to do and i really want to help people. so i thought i wanted to be a doctor, but i also want to shoot someone in my life, so i thought, maybe a body guard. but im really aiming for the doctor, because there is less chance of death for the pay. to get payed well as a body guard, i need to protect someone rich, increasing the risk of death.
So my goals in life are: 1. Help people as much as i can with what i can 2. Shoot someone 3. Live a full, awesome life 4. Get a good education
